entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Application Description

Administre uma loja de doces japoneses com o popular personagem de mang√° Doraemon e seus amigos. Fa√ßa o dorayaki favorito de Doraemon e muitos outros tipos de doces para angariar muitos clientes e virar a sensa√ß√£o da cidade. Todo o progresso do jogo √© armazenado em seu dispositivo. Os dados ao salvar n√£o podem ser recuperados ap√≥s serem exclu√≠dos ou ap√≥s reinstalar o aplicativo. A transfer√™ncia de dados para outro dispositivo n√£o √© suportada. Busque "Kairosoft" para ver todos os nossos jogos ou visite-nos em https://kairopark.jp. Compras integradas

  • Lifetime - EducationÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÂçáÁ∫ßÁªàË∫´‰ºöÂëòÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

  • ÊúàÂ∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö8,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

entry.title: MyTracks: GPS Recorder
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 0,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Compras integradas

  • 300 Altitude Query TimesÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • 100 Altitude Query TimesÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Lifetime PremiumÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations. Here's what you can do with MyTracks: - Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map. - Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app. - Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ. - Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks. - Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations. - Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance. - Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time. - Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track. - Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification. Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story. The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability! "Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world. One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars. [Features of Knight and Dragon 3] ‚ñΩ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game! ‚ñΩ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy‚Äôs attack timings! ‚ñΩ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons! ‚ñΩ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong! ‚ñΩ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story! ‚ñΩ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued! „Éª„Éª„Éª For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try. Official Homepage http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

O Titan Quest cativou legi√µes de jogadores desde a sua estreia em 2006. Tu recebes a experi√™ncia abrangente de uma jornada desenfreada e verdadeiramente her√≥ica pelos mundos de Titan Quest! A tua honrosa miss√£o √© salvar o mundo! Sozinhos, os deuses sozinhos n√£o conseguem derrotar os Tit√£s. Por isso, s√£o necess√°rios her√≥is reais - e s√≥ podes ser tu! O teu sucesso ou fracasso decidir√° o destino do povo e dos Olympians! Percorre os mundos m√≠sticos e antigos da Gr√©cia, Egito, Babil√≥nia e China com o teu her√≥i personalizado. Conquista as hordas de criaturas lend√°rias e domina v√°rias armas e artes marciais: tiro com arco, luta de espadas ou o uso de magia poderosa! Viaja por um mundo de antiguidade e mitologia n√≥rdica! Luta contra as feras da mitologia enquanto viajas para o Partenon, as Grandes Pir√¢mides, os Jardins Suspensos da Babil√≥nia, a Grande Muralha, a Arena do T√°rtaro e outros lugares famosos. Encontra os maiores vil√µes da mitologia grega, descobre as terras desconhecidas do norte da Europa, procura o reino m√≠tico da Atl√¢ntida e faz uma jornada pelo Mediterr√¢neo Ocidental. √â tudo ou nada no teu caminho glorioso! A cada desafio que te espera, ter√°s que derrotar inimigos maiores e mais fortes at√© atingires o teu objetivo e for√ßar os Tit√£s a ajoelharem! Corre para a batalha ao lado de bravos companheiros de estima√ß√£o! Encontra itens extraordin√°rios com poderes especiais que ir√£o melhorar as tuas capacidades e ajudar-te no teu caminho. Espadas lend√°rias, feiti√ßos de rel√¢mpagos poderosos, magia, arcos e v√°rios outros tesouros com poderes inimagin√°veis esperam por ti - todos eles est√£o √† tua disposi√ß√£o nas tuas batalhas e espalham medo e terror entre as criaturas horr√≠veis! De que est√°s √† espera? Como nenhum outro jogo no g√©nero RPG de a√ß√£o, o Titan Quest: Edi√ß√£o Lend√°ria combina o fascinante mundo da mitologia com a a√ß√£o intermin√°vel e emocionante que esperas de um jogo t√£o atraente! Caracter√≠sticas principais: - No DLC do Trono Imortal, encontrar√°s os maiores vil√µes da mitologia grega, enfrentar√°s os ataques de Cerberus e arriscar√°s as margens do Rio Styx. Deves interpretar as profecias do vidente cego Tir√©sias, lutar ao lado de Agamenon e Aquiles e usar os ardis de Odisseu para conquistar esta nova aventura sombria. - Nas terras desconhecidas do norte da Europa no Ragnar√∂k DLC, enfrentar√°s os reinos dos celtas, dos homens do norte e dos deuses Asgardianos! - Conhece um explorador no DLC Atlantis, em busca do reino m√≠tico da Atl√¢ntida. Uma chave est√° supostamente escondida no di√°rio de H√©rcules, que dizem estar localizado na cidade fen√≠cia de Gadir. Come√ßa uma jornada pelo Mediterr√¢neo Ocidental, incluindo a Arena do T√°rtaro para batalhas √©picas! + Todas as atualiza√ß√µes importantes foram implementadas no Titan Quest revisto tecnicamente para garantir a melhor experi√™ncia de jogo deste cl√°ssico de todos os tempos! + ETERNAL EMBERS DLCs dispon√≠veis como compra in-app - Invocado pelo lend√°rio Imperador Yao, o Her√≥i √© chamado de volta ao Leste para lidar com uma amea√ßa demon√≠aca que est√° devastando a terra depois que o Telkine foi morto. + Uma nota para todos os jogadores que possuem a vers√£o b√°sica do Titan Quest: Os DLCs mencionados aqui tamb√©m ser√£o lan√ßados para compra como conte√∫do adicional para que todos os f√£s possam atualizar os seus jogos para desfrutarem todas as expans√µes! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Description

Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane e Timmy voltam a enfrentar o apocalipse nuclear nesta nova edi√ß√£o remasterizada da aventura at√¥mica cl√°ssica 60 Seconds! Reatomized. O jogo agora inclui arte em alta resolu√ß√£o, gr√°ficos 2D atualizados e texturas 3D feitas √† m√£o, um novo menu interativo, interface melhorada, uma atualiza√ß√£o t√©cnica e, √© claro... conte√∫do novo! NOVO MODO DE JOGO Desafios de Sobreviv√™ncia - hist√≥rias curtas singulares que testam suas habilidades de sobreviv√™ncia! NOVAS OPORTUNIDADES para escapar da terra de ningu√©m em uma hist√≥ria que se ramifica por m√∫ltiplas trajet√≥rias de jogo! Ser√° que voc√™ consegue escapar em grande estilo? NOVO SISTEMA DE RELACIONAMENTOS mais hist√≥rias e intera√ß√µes malucas entre os membros da fam√≠lia McDoodle! NOVOS EFEITOS SONOROS, ARTE E CONTE√öDO VISUAL DESBLOQUE√ÅVEL permitindo deixar seu abrigo nuclear mais colorido! NOVAS CONQUISTAS! Restando apenas 60 segundos para o impacto final, saia em uma corrida louca pela casa em busca dos membros da fam√≠lia e de mantimentos √∫teis. Tudo estar√° contra voc√™ - o tempo, a mob√≠lia, a configura√ß√£o da casa (que muda a cada partida) e ainda a pergunta fundamental: o que levar e o que deixar para tr√°s? Mas chegar a tempo ao abrigo nuclear √© apenas o come√ßo. O que e quem voc√™ salvou da explos√£o ter√£o um papel vital na sua sobreviv√™ncia. Cada hist√≥ria ser√° diferente, e cada dia haver√° surpresas e eventos inesperados. Ser√° que todas essas hist√≥rias ter√£o um final feliz? S√≥ depende de voc√™. Racione √°gua e comida, fa√ßa o melhor uso dos mantimentos, enfrente escolhas dif√≠ceis e at√© aventure-se na terra de ningu√©m. Boa sorte.

entry.content:

Application Description

Save the world by the power of music in this dynamic & refreshing rhythm game! Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book! AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS 2016 1st IMGA SEA ‚ÄúExcellence in Audio‚Äù 2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award ‚ÄúBest Audio‚Äù 2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee 2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia ‚ÄúBest Mobile Game‚Äù Nominee FEATURES >> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game! >> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book "I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order." "Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir! >> Achievement, Leaderboard, and More Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save. LINKS Official site https://noxygames.com/lanota/ Privacy Policy & Terms of Use https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html Twitter https://twitter.com/Noxy_Lanota_EN/ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lanota/ Discord Server https://discord.gg/lanota

Application Description

# Filebar Filebar ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æÁé∞‰ª£ÂåñÁöÑÂ§öÂ™í‰ΩìÊí≠ÊîæÂô®ÔºåÊèê‰æõËßÜÈ¢ëÊí≠ÊîæÂô®„ÄÅÈü≥‰πêÊí≠ÊîæÂô®„ÄÅ‰∫ëÁ´ØÊúçÂä°ÂíåÊñá‰ª∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜÁöÑÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÇ ## ‰∏ªË¶ÅÂäüËÉΩ ### ËßÜÈ¢ëÊí≠ÊîæÂô® Filebar Êèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Âº∫Â§ßÁöÑËßÜÈ¢ëÊí≠ÊîæÂô®Ôºå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Êí≠ÊîæÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑËßÜÈ¢ëÊ†ºÂºèÔºåÂåÖÊã¨Ê†áÂáÜÁöÑMP4„ÄÅM4V Âíå MOVÔºåËøòÂä†‰∏äMKV„ÄÅAVI„ÄÅWMV„ÄÅFLV„ÄÅOMG„ÄÅOGV„ÄÅ3GP„ÄÅRMVBÁ≠â„ÄÇÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÊµèËßàÊí≠Êîæ‰Ω†ÁöÑmac„ÄÅpc„ÄÅNAS„ÄÅFTP‰∏äÁöÑËßÜÈ¢ëÔºåÂêåÊó∂ËøòÊîØÊåÅÊí≠ÊîæÂ™í‰ΩìÊúçÂä°Âô® ÔºàÂ¶ÇEmby„ÄÅJellyfin„ÄÅPlexÂ™í‰ΩìÊúçÂä°Âô®Ôºâ‰∏äÁöÑËßÜÈ¢ëÔºåÊÇ®‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Êí≠ÊîæÊù•Ëá™‰∫ëÁ´ØÊúçÂä°ÁöÑËßÜÈ¢ë„ÄÇ ### Èü≥‰πêÊí≠ÊîæÂô® Filebar Êèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊºÇ‰∫ÆÁöÑÊú¨Âú∞Èü≥‰πêÊí≠ÊîæÂô®Áî®Êù•Êí≠ÊîæÊú¨Âú∞Âíå‰∫ëÁ´ØÈü≥‰πêÔºåÊîØÊåÅÁöÑÈü≥È¢ëÊ†ºÂºèÊúâ MP3/M4A/FLAC„ÄÇFilebar ÊîØÊåÅÂä†ËΩΩÂêåÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑÊ≠åËØçÊñá‰ª∂Ôºå‰æãÂ¶Ç Ê≠åÊõ≤ÂêçÁß∞.mp3„ÄÅÊ≠åÊõ≤ÂêçÁß∞.lrc ÁöÑÊ≠åËØçÊñá‰ª∂‰ºöËá™Âä®Âä†ËΩΩ„ÄÇ ### ‰∫ëÁ´ØÊúçÂä° ‰∫ëÁ´ØÊúçÂä°ÊòØ Filebar Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê†∏ÂøÉÂäüËÉΩÔºåÈÄöËøá Filebar ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Êñπ‰æøÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∫ëÁ´ØÊúçÂä°ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ ÂàõÂª∫Êñá‰ª∂Â§π/Âà†Èô§/Êí≠Êîæ/ÊâπÈáèÈáçÂëΩÂêç/Êü•Áúã‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÊîØÊåÅÁôæÂ∫¶ÁΩëÁõò„ÄÅÈòøÈáå‰∫ëÁõò„ÄÅOneDrive„ÄÅDropbox„ÄÅGoogle Drive Á≠âÂ∏∏ËßÅÁΩëÁõò„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂‰πüÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜËøúÁ®ãÂçèËÆÆÁöÑÊîØÊåÅÔºåÊîØÊåÅÁöÑÂçèËÆÆÊúâ SMB„ÄÅWebDAV„ÄÅSynology„ÄÅFTP„ÄÅSFTP„ÄÇ ### Êñá‰ª∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜ ÂêåÊó∂ Filebar ËøòÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñá‰ª∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®„ÄÇÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÁÆ°ÁêÜÊÇ®ÁöÑÊú¨Âú∞‰∏éËøúÁ®ãÊñá‰ª∂ÔºöÁßªÂä®„ÄÅÂà†Èô§„ÄÅÁºñËæë„ÄÅÂ§çÂà∂„ÄÅ‰∏ä‰º†„ÄÅÊâπÈáèÈáçÂëΩÂêçÁ≠âÁ≠âÔºõÂêåÊó∂Filebar ËøòÊîØÊåÅÂØπ‰∫éÂ∏∏ËßÅÂéãÁº©Êñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂ¶ÇZip„ÄÅRar„ÄÅ7zÁ≠âÂéãÁº©Êñá‰ª∂Ê†ºÂºè„ÄÇ ## ÂÆ¢Êà∑ÊîØÊåÅ Â¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Êúâ‰ªª‰ΩïÂª∫ËÆÆÊàñÊÉ≥Ê≥ïÔºåÊ¨¢ËøéËÅîÁ≥ªÊàë‰ª¨„ÄÇ - ÁΩëÁ´ôÔºöhttps://fileball.app - ÈÇÆ‰ª∂Ôºöfilebox.app@outlook.com

entry.title: Dark Reader for Safari
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 1,99¬†‚Ç¨ [1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 8,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Dark Reader is an eye-care Safari extension that enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. It inverts bright colors to make web pages high contrast and easier to read. Dark Reader integrates seamlessly with system dark mode. Adjust brightness and contrast to match your display and ambient lighting. Enable dark mode on every web page or give websites a sepia tone. Select from multiple color theme presets or create your own by customizing background and text colors. Enable or disable Dark Reader for specific websites, automatically sync with system dark mode, or detect already dark websites and leave them unchanged. Developed by the original creators of Dark Reader. Since 2014, we continuously evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support for people sensitive to bright light. A single purchase includes access to the macOS version (Safari browser) when using the same iCloud account. Dark Reader contains no ads and does not collect user data. Enable Dark Reader in Safari preferences and disable similar extensions to prevent conflicts. Enjoy browsing!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
